seo.title: Ongoing Growth Support (Monthly) | SEO, Ads & Optimization | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: Monthly growth support for SMEs: continuous SEO, content and Ads optimization with clean tracking (GA4/GTM), reporting and conversion improvements—so results compound over time.

content.title:
Your growth system:
SEO, Ads & optimization — every month
content.subtitle: Websites and campaigns don’t “work once”. They work when you improve them consistently.
content.body: Most businesses launch a website or run campaigns… then stop. Results plateau because nothing evolves: pages aren’t updated, tracking gets messy, content doesn’t compound and campaigns don’t learn. We run a monthly rhythm focused on leads and measurable improvements.

content.title: If you want steady results, you need steady work
content.subtitle: Growth happens with iterations: small improvements that compound.
content.body: This is for teams that want a reliable partner: priorities, execution, measurement and reporting—without chaos.

columns.subtitle: Typical scenario
columns.description: You already have a website (and maybe Ads), but leads aren’t consistent. Content is sporadic, SEO is “basic”, and decisions are made without clean data.

columns.subtitle: What you get
columns.description: A monthly growth cadence: ongoing SEO & content, Ads optimization when relevant, conversion improvements, clean GA4/GTM key events and simple reporting.

content.title: A clear monthly workflow (so you always know what’s next)
content.subtitle: Priorities, execution, measurement—repeat.
content.body: Each month we pick the highest-impact actions based on your goal: leads, sales or visibility. We ship improvements, track results, and decide the next iteration using real data—not opinions.

header.title: Ongoing work that compounds results
header.subtitle: Not random tasks: a system built around your goal.
header.body: We adapt the monthly plan to your stage and budget. Below are the most common areas we work on.

items.title: Ongoing SEO improvements
items.description: Technical checks, internal linking, page updates and intent alignment to increase qualified organic traffic over time.

items.title: Content plan & publishing
items.description: Sustainable editorial cadence: topics based on real queries, service page expansions, FAQs and “quotable” answers.

items.title: Conversion rate optimization
items.description: Improve CTAs, forms, messaging and page structure. Small changes that increase enquiries without increasing traffic.

items.title: Campaign optimization
items.description: Budget allocation, search terms, creatives and landing alignment. Focused on CPL, lead quality and measurable outcomes.

items.title: GA4/GTM key events + reporting
items.description: Clean measurement for forms, calls, WhatsApp and bookings, plus simple monthly reporting to guide decisions.

items.title: Landing page iterations
items.description: Ongoing improvements and variants for high-performing offers: messaging, proof, sections and friction reduction.

header.title: Growth works best when these pieces are in place

items.title: Landing pages & lead generation
items.description: Focused pages for offers and campaigns, built to convert and measure.

items.title: SEO copywriting & content
items.description: Service pages and content that rank and convert—built for intent.

items.title: Ads management & tracking
items.description: Google/Meta Ads with clean GA4/GTM key events and conversion measurement.

items.title: Digital strategy
items.description: Goals, priorities and a plan to keep execution focused.
